s1.b: Equipment for the production of cereals
s1.d: Equipment for the production of flour

s4.b: Years of development and implementation experience

s5.t2: The leader of grain cleaning equipment in Ukraine. Our company specializes in the development, production and implementation in the industry of technologies and equipment for grain processing. Today we have original modern technologies and equipment in all major areas of grain cleaning, flour and cereal production, which is confirmed by more than 30 patents in this area. LLC 'OLIS' produces about 200 tons of equipment and has the ability to produce various grain cleaning complexes, mills and cereal workshops from the development stage to commissioning.

s6.t1: What countries do we work in
s6.t2: The technological level and organization of our production allows us to provide high quality products at convincing prices and supply them to more than 30 countries near and far abroad.
